summary: A seller of medical related products protests an assessment of retail sales tax asserting that, pursuant to RCW 82.08.050(7), its acceptance of blanket exemption certificates specific to RCW 82.08.0281 and RCW [82.08.0283] tax-exempt sales relieves it of personal liability for retail sales tax due on sales of items not exempt under those statutory exemptions. The taxpayer’s petition is denied.
